titles.title: The Kingdom Of God Is Not Of Meat

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Kingdom of God is not of meat, (Echo.)
The Kingdom of God is not of drink, (Echo.)
But of righteousness and peace, (Echo.)
Fullness of joy in the Holy Ghost. (Echo.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith, (Echo.)
Being rooted and grounded in love, (Echo.)
And ye be filled with the fullness of God, (Echo.)
According to the power the power that worketh in us. (Echo.)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
That righteousness may dwell in your hearts by faith, (Echo.)
Being rooted and grounded in love, (Echo.)
And ye be filled with the fullness of God, (Echo.)
According to the power the power that worketh in us. (Echo.)
Chorus:
This is the mystery of the overcomer:
Christ in you, the hope of glory.
Lay yourself aside; seek all the fullness of God,
For of His kingdom there shall be no end.
